SMART HOME NX

This was a project for home design consultants where they helped their users discover and install best technology for their home.

We made an extensive website (11 unique pages) with a contact form which was a major source of lead generation.

It had a very clean UI as it was a pro-tech service. The challenge was to showcase the service using the products that gets installed.

We included a basic portfolio of ideas and inspirations implemented before along with a clientele list.



http://www.smarthomenx.com/
